Class
Description
CustomUserDetailsService
Service for retrieving user details for authentication purposes.

Ex5ApplicationTests
 
HomeController
Controller for handling the main homepage and other general routes.
MessageConfig
Configuration for message resources in a Spring application.
PasswordConfig
Configuration for password encoding in Spring Security.
RegistrationController
Controller for handling user registration.
RegistrationForm
DTO for capturing user registration details with validation rules for each field.
ScamReport
Entity class for scam reports.
ScamReportController
Controller for handling requests related to scam reports.

Repository interface for handling the database operations for ScamReport entities.

Service for managing scam reports.
SecurityConfig
Security configuration class for Spring Security setup.

DTO for capturing user registration form details specifically for testing purposes with validation rules.
User
Entity class for users.

Repository interface for handling the database operations for User entities.

Configuration class that implements WebMvcConfigurer for MVC and view controller registration.
WebSocketConfig
Configures WebSocket communication using Spring Messaging.
WebSocketController
Controller to handle WebSocket communication for scam reports.
